import React from 'react' import { CButton, CCard, CCardBody, CCardHeader, CPopover, CRow, CCol } from '@coreui/react' import { DocsExample } from 'src/components' const Popovers = () => { return ( React Popover Basic example Click to toggle popover React Popover Four directions

Four options are available: top, right, bottom, and left aligned. Directions are mirrored when using CoreUI for React in RTL.

Popover on top Popover on right Popover on bottom Popover on left ) } export default Popovers
